```{r}
require(mosaic)
gender_discrimination <- openintro::gender_discrimination
tally(~ gender + decision, data = gender_discrimination)


```


```{r}
tally(~ gender + shuffle(decision), data = gender_discrimination)
```

```{r}
null_dist <- do(5000) * tally(~ gender + shuffle(decision), data = gender_discrimination)
pd<-data.frame(pd=(null_dist$male.promoted/24-null_dist$female.promoted/24))
hist(pd$pd)
abline(v=21/24-14/24)
```
```{r}
mean(pd$pd>(21/24-14/24))
#OR
count(pd$pd>(21/24-14/24))/5000
```
#Class Example 2
```{r}
phats <- do(5000) * rflip(n=75)
hist(phats$prop)
abline(v=0.66)
mean(phats$prop>(0.66))
mean(phats$prop>(0.66)) * 100
```
